description: Built for ultimate freedom and mobility, the long-sleeve Rhythm Tee features Nuyarn merino wool technology—making it ultra-light, while increasing performance at the same time. The Rhythm’s Nuyarn fabric dries five times faster than standard merino, while providing 35% more stretch. This means the Rhythm Tee is the world’s lightest ultimate high output, breathable layer or trail running shirt.
name: Black Diamond Rhythm LS Tee - Mens
